DOC.brief_summary: To study the safety, immunogenicity and efficacy of an investigational H. pylori vaccine, compared with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of an H.Pylori Vaccine in H.Pylori-Negative Adults
DOC.criteria: adults 18 40 years of age in good health HP uninfected not pregnant and agree to use birth control throughout the study (females who can become pregnant) remote or current HP infection
